TopicTitle: Know how to dev, get a free droid from NASA,;^)

Articles.Content:
Given all the really bad science threads we have been seeing lately it might be refreshing to see what actual scientist might be up to:

[url]http://phys.org/news/2015-11-nasa-mit-humanoid-robot-software.html[/url]

Sadly, when I read this, the first thing I thought was, "NASA is giving smart phones to people who post legit science articles?"

:sticktongue:
